title: Give Us Notices for Future Gifting Events!
body:
I love the idea of gifting people champions with IP.  As a long-time player, I've unlocked every champ I wanted, and only have about 20 still locked.  I would have gladly bought a champion for someone...if I didn't just drop 6300 IP on Kalista just because.

Give us a heads up next time so those of us who don't really need IP but still use it can save up for our fellow summoners!

replies.body: Hey! We appreciate the feedback, since it the first time we've really done something like this. As a heads up, we'll also have a Double IP this weekend, to help you grind out some IP for Xayah or Rakan, either for yourself, or to gift! :)
